XenotypeDef.label: ander
XenotypeDef.description: An elf-like people known for their pointed ears, natural attractiveness, and long hair. Anders are naturally aggressive and beardless, with a tendency toward pale skin and various hair colors ranging from blonde to brown. They embody grace and martial prowess in equal measure.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Elf-like warriors with pointed ears and natural beauty.
